en: Make haste, O God, to deliver me; Make haste to help me, O Jehovah.
hmr: Aw Pathien, kei mi sanhim dingin inhmaw la, Aw LALPA, mi ṭhangpui dingin inhmaw rawh.

en: Let them be put to shame and confounded That seek after my soul: Let them be turned backward and brought to dishonor That delight in my hurt.
hmr: Ka hringna sukbo tuma zawngtuhai chu, Muolphotak le inzaktakin um sienla, Ka sietna chunga lâwmhai chu: Intlânsiettira sukzakin um raw se.

en: Let them be turned back by reason of their shame That say, Aha, aha.
hmr: “Chei! Chei!” tituhai chu, An muolpho leiin intlânsiettirin um raw hai se.

en: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee; And let such as love thy salvation say continually, Let God be magnified.
hmr: A zawngtu che po pohai chu nangmaa chun hlimtak le lâwmtakin um sienla, I sandamna ngainatuhai chun, “Pathien chu chawimawiin um raw se,” ti rawp raw hai se.

en: But I am poor and needy; Make haste unto me, O God: Thou art my help and my deliverer; O Jehovah, make no tarrying.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, kei chu pasie le rimsitak ka na, Aw Pathien, ka kuomah hung vak rawh: Nang chu a mi ṭhangpuitu le a mi sandamtu i na, Aw LALPA, sawt riel lul naw raw khai.
